name: Broc'sDailyDose
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Broc Romanek of TheCorporateCounsel.net brings his decades of experience reporting on the state of affairs for the SEC, corporate & securities law, corporate governance and his own perspective of the world in this regular news briefing...
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
